__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Ores and minerals

pages.text: Os minérios e minerais em Terrafirmacraft são raros - ao contrário da baunilha, os minérios são encontrados em veias maciças, escassas e raras que requerem algumas $(l:mechanics/prospecting)prospecção$() localizar. Minérios diferentes também aparecerão em diferentes tipos de rochas e em diferentes elevações, o que significa encontrar o tipo de rocha certo na altitude certa é a chave para localizar o minério que você está procurando.

In addition, some ores are $(thing)Graded$(). Ore blocks may be Poor, Normal, or Rich, and different veins will have different concentrations of each type of block. Veins that are $(thing)richer$() are more lucrative.$(br2)The next several pages show the different types of ores, what they look like, and where to find them.

Native Copper is an ore of $(thing)Copper$() metal. It can be found in $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Extrusive$() rocks, at elevations above y=40.$(br2)It can also be found in deposits in $(thing)rivers$(), which can be $(l:mechanics/panning)panned$().
pages.title: Cobre nativo

pages.text: Minérios de cobre nativos em dacita.

Native Gold is an ore of $(thing)Gold$() metal. It can be found at elevations below y=70, but deeper veins are larger and richer. It can be found in $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Extrusive$() and $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_intrusive)Igneous Intrusive$() rocks.$(br2)It can also be found in deposits in $(thing)rivers$(), which can be $(l:mechanics/panning)panned$().
pages.title: Ouro nativo

pages.text: Minérios de ouro nativos em diorito.

Native Silver is an ore of $(thing)Silver$() metal. Small poor veins can be found in $(thing)Granite$() or $(thing)Diorite$() in uplift regions, above y=90. Larger and richer veins can be found in $(thing)Granite$(), $(thing)Diorite$(), $(thing)Schist$(), and $(thing)Gneiss$() deep underground below y=20.$(br2)It can also be found in deposits in $(thing)rivers$(), which can be $(l:mechanics/panning)panned$().
pages.title: Prata nativa

pages.text: Minérios de prata nativos em granito.

Tetraedrito é um minério de $(thing)Cobre$() metal. Pode ser encontrado em qualquer elevação, mas as veias mais profundas são muitas vezes mais ricas. Pode ser encontrado em $(l:the_world/geology#metamorphic)Metamórfica$() pedras.
pages.title: Tetraedrito

pages.text: Minérios de tetraedrito no xisto.

Malachite is an ore of $(thing)Copper$() metal. It can be found primarily in $(thing)Marble$() or $(thing)Limestone$(), $(thing)Chalk$(), and $(thing)Dolomite$(). It can be found at most elevations, however deeper veins are often larger and richer.
pages.title: Malaquita

pages.text: Minérios malaquita em mármore.

Cassiterite is an ore of $(thing)Tin$() metal. It can be found in $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_intrusive)Igneous Intrusive$() rocks at high elevation, above y=80 in uplift regions or in dikes.$(br2)It can also be found in deposits in $(thing)rivers$(), which can be $(l:mechanics/panning)panned$().
pages.title: Cassiterito

pages.text: Minérios de cassiterita em diorito.

Bismuthinite is an ore of $(thing)Bismuth$() metal. It can be found in $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks near the surface, or larger and richer veins in $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_intrusive)Igneous Intrusive$() rocks deep underground.
pages.title: Bismutinita

pages.text: Minérios bismutinitos no xisto.

Garnierite is an ore of $(thing)Nickel$() metal. It can be found at elevations below y=0. It can be found primarily in $(thing)Gabbro$() deep underground. Smaller, rarer veins can also be found in any $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_intrusive)Igneous Intrusive$() rock.
pages.title: Garnings

pages.text: Minérios Garnierite em Gabro.
Hematite is an ore of $(thing)Iron$() metal. It can be found in large veins in any $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Extrusive$() rocks near the surface.
pages.title: Hematita

pages.text: Minérios de hematita em andesita.
Magnetite is an ore of $(thing)Iron$() metal. It can be found in large veins in any $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks near the surface.
pages.title: Magnetita

pages.text: Minérios de magnetita em calcário.
Limonite is an ore of $(thing)Iron$() metal. It can be found in large veins in any $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks near the surface.
pages.title: Limonite

pages.text: Minérios de limonita em giz.

Sphalerite is an ore of $(thing)Zinc$() metal. Small, poor veins can be found in $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Extrusive$() rocks near the surface, and large richer veins can be found in $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_intrusive)Igneous Intrusive$() rocks deep underground.
pages.title: Esfalerita

pages.text: Minérios de esfalerita em quartzito.

pages.title: Lignite
pages.text: Lignite is a type of low-grade $(thing)Coal$() ore. It can be found in very large flat deposits near the surface in $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks.
Lignita em dolomita.

pages.title: Carvão betuminoso
pages.text: Bituminous Coal is a type of mid-grade $(thing)Coal$() ore. It can be found in very large flat deposits near the surface in $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks.
Carvão betuminoso em chert.

pages.title: Caulinita
pages.text: Kaolinite is a soft $(thing)Mineral$() which is used in the construction of $(l:mechanics/fire_clay)Fire Clay$(). It can be found spawning at high altitudes in Plateaus, Old Mountains, Rolling Hills, and Highlands, at a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 18°C, with a $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at least 300mm. The $(thing)Blood Lily$() flower grows on Kaolin clay.
Variants of kaolin clay.

pages.title: Grafite
pages.text: Graphite is a $(thing)Mineral$() which is used in the construction of $(l:mechanics/fire_clay)Fire Clay$(). It can be found in $(thing)Gneiss$(), $(thing)Marble$(), $(thing)Quartzite$(), and $(thing)Schist$() rocks, in elevations below y=60.
Grafite em Gnaisse.

pages.title: Cinnabar
pages.text: Cinnabar is a $(thing)Mineral$() which can be ground in the $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$() to obtain $(thing)Redstone Dust$(). It can be found in veins deep underground, in $(thing)Quartzite$(), $(thing)Granite$(), $(thing)Phyllite$(), and $(thing)Schist$().
Cinnabar em quartzito.

pages.title: Criolito
pages.text: Cryolite is a $(thing)Mineral$() which can be ground in the $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$() to obtain $(thing)Redstone Dust$(). It can be found in veins deep underground, in $(thing)Granite$(), and $(thing)Diorite$().
Criolito em granito.

pages.title: Salitre
pages.text: Saltpeter is a $(thing)Mineral$() which can be ground in the $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$(), and then used in the crafting of $(thing)Gunpowder$(). It can be found in very large flat deposits near the surface in $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks.
Saltpeter em xisto.

pages.title: Enxofre
pages.text: Sulfur is a $(thing)Mineral$() which can be ground in the $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$(), and then used in the crafting of $(thing)Gunpowder$(). It is found near lava level deep underground, in sparse but large and plentiful veins, in any $(l:the_world/geology#metamorphic)Metamorphic$() or $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_intrusive)Igneous Intrusive$() rock.
Sulfur in Gabbro.

pages.title: Sylvite
pages.text: Sylvite is a $(thing)Mineral$() which can be ground in the $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$(), and then used as a $(l:mechanics/fertilizers)Fertilizer$(). It can be found in very large flat deposits near the surface in $(thing)Shale$(), $(thing)Claystone$() and $(thing)Chert$().
Sylvite em Chert.

pages.title: Borax
pages.text: Borax is a $(thing)Mineral$() which can be ground in the $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$() to produce $(l:mechanics/flux)Flux$(). It can be found in very large flat deposits near the surface in $(thing)Claystone$(), $(thing)Limestone$(), and $(thing)Shale$().
Borax em xisto.

pages.title: Gesso
pages.text: Gypsum is a decorative $(thing)Mineral$() which can be used to make $(l:mechanics/advanced_building_materials#alabaster)Alabaster$(). It can be found in very large flat deposits near the surface in $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks.
Gypsum in Chalk.

pages.title: Halita
pages.text: Halite is a $(thing)Mineral$() which can be ground in the $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$() to make $(thing)Salt$(), which is an important $(l:mechanics/decay#salting)Preservative$(). It can be found in very large flat deposits near the surface in $(l:the_world/geology#sedimentary)Sedimentary$() rocks.
Halita em giz.

pages.title: Esmeralda
pages.text: Emerald é um decorativo $(l:mechanics/gems)pedra preciosa$(). Parece muito bem, talvez se você pudesse encontrar alguém neste mundo incrivelmente solitário, você poderia trocá-lo com eles...$(br2)Aparece em formações verticais finas de minério, que podem ter até 60 quarteirões de altura. Pode ser encontrado em $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_intrusive)Intrusivo ígneo$() pedras.
Esmeralda em diorito.

pages.title: Kimberlite
pages.text: Kimberlite é decorativo e inestimável $(l:mechanics/gems)pedra preciosa$(). Aparece em finas formações de minério vertical chamadas $(l:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Volcanic_pipe)Tubos de Kimberlite$() que pode ter até 60 quarteirões de altura. Só pode ser encontrado em $(thing)Gabro$().
Kimberlite em Gabbro.

pages.title: Lapis Lazuli
pages.text: Lapis Lazuli is a decorative $(thing)Mineral$() which can be used to make $(l:mechanics/dye)Blue Dye$(). It can be found in large, but sparse veins in $(thing)Limestone$() and $(thing)Marble$(), between y=-20 and y=80.
Lapis Lazuli in Marble.

pages.title: Amethyst
pages.text: Amethyst is a decorative $(thing)Mineral$() which can be used to make $(l:mechanics/glassworking)Glass$(). It can be found in $(thing)Sedimentary$() and $(thing)Metamorphic$() rock beneath rivers above y=40.
Amethyst in Marble.

pages.title: Opal
pages.text: Opal is a decorative $(thing)Mineral$(). It can be found in $(thing)Sedimentary) and $(thing)Igneous Extrusive$() rock beneath rivers above y=40.
Opal in Basalt.
